publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-77 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Education (School Meals) (Scotland) Bill - Suspension of Standing Ordersâ€”That the Parliament agrees that Rules 9.5.3A, 9.5.3B, 9.6.1, 9.6.2, 9.6.3, 9.6.4, 9.6.5, 9.6.6, 9.7.9, 9.8.3 and 9.10.4 of the Standing Orders be suspended for the purposes of the Education (School Meals) (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Tavish Scott*
